channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 1/5: CBS Evening News
item.description: New details on the covert operation to capture Venezuela's Maduro and his wife. Plus, what happened Monday in Maduro's court appearance.

item.title: Epstein files: 2 million records in various stages of review, DOJ says

item.title: Swiss bar where fatal New Year's fire broke out had last safety inspection in 2019

item.title: Swiss bar where dozens died in blaze hadn't been inspected in several years
item.description: Fire safety inspections hadn't been carried out for several years at the bar where a fire that broke out at a New Year's party left 40 people dead and...

item.title: WATCH: Deer with bag stuck on head gets a little help from friendly commuter
item.description: A man on his way to work in the Florida Keys pulled over to help a deer that got its head trapped in a bag.

item.title: WATCH: 2 hikers saved from edge of steep cliff in California
item.description: A paramedic helped the women move to a safer location on the rocks, and then onto the chopper.

item.title: Former Uvalde officer accused of not protecting students during 2022 shooting goes on trial
Venezuela live updates: Machado says Trump deserves Nobel Peace Prize
item.description: The president of Venezuela was taken by American forces and transported to the U.S. Saturday to face federal drug charges.

item.title: These numbers tell the story of the Los Angeles wildfires, one year later

item.title: 1/5: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: The latest reporting on former Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro's not guilty plea to drug trafficking charges and new details on his capture.

item.title: US cuts the number of vaccines recommended for every child, a move slammed by physicians
